data.claim: Design Study Materials Master List: Glassmorphism (ui.glass, Hype4 Academy, Figma plugins), Bento Grids (bentogrids.com, SaaSFrame, Tailwind UI), Landing Pages (Shopify, Swipe Pages guides), Color Theory (Material Design 3, Supercharge Design), Typography (Figma resource library, Google Fonts Knowledge, Material Design typography). Key stat: 67% of top 100 SaaS websites use bento-style layouts.
